actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to protect American workers from the adverse impact of illegal alien employment.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that employment of an illegal alien shall constitute harboring for the purposes of the Act. Prohibits the employment or referring for a fee for employment of any such alien. Permits the Attorney General to serve a citation for violations of this Act and sets civil penalties for violating this Act after such citation is served. Directs that such fines and penalties as are collected be used for the enforcement of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to protect American workers from the adverse impact of illegal alien employment.
